verses.name: Acts 12:1
verses.text: Now about that time Herod the king stretched forth his hands to vex certain of the church.

verses.name: Acts 12:2
verses.text: And he killed James the brother of John with the sword.

verses.name: Acts 12:3
verses.text: And because he saw it pleased the Jews, he proceeded further to take Peter also. (Then were the days of unleavened bread.)

verses.name: Acts 12:4
verses.text: And when he had apprehended him, he put him in prison, and delivered him to four quaternions of soldiers to keep him; intending after Easter to bring him forth to the people.
